title: My Brother and I - Paragraph 2 is notable

content.prompt: Paragraph 2 ("He doesn't ... may be") is notable mainly because the author

choices.label: admits that he was not an easy child to know
uses ellipsis to express personal confusion and despair over the past
acknowledges his struggle to accept how his past has affected his identity
metaphorically explains that we can never see ourselves with mirrorlike clarity

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
